targets.query:
from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ssh_sessions"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "web_time"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "web_ip"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "internet_status"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

panels.description: The average, over the last minute, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "hrProcessorLoad"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

panels.title: 🧠 CPU Utilization

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "laLoadFloat" and
        r.laNames == "Load-1"        
        )
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 4.0 })) //calculate per CPU core value
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCInOctets" and 
        r.ifName == "eth0"
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCOutOctets" and 
        r.ifName == "eth0"
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCInOctets" and
        r.ifName == "eth0"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCOutOctets" and
        r.ifName == "eth0"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "processes_running"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "sysName"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCInOctets" and 
        (r.ifName == "eth6" or r.ifName == "eth7")
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "agent_host"])    
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "ifHCOutOctets" and 
        (r.ifName == "eth6" or r.ifName == "eth7")
        )
    |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "agent_host"]) 
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        (r._field == "wireless_clients_2_4_GHz" or r._field == "wireless_clients_5_GHz")       
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: -3m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "partition_jffs_usage"
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host", "sysName"])

from(bucket: "tig")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>
        r._measurement == "router_asus" and
        r._field == "memTotalFree"    
        )
    |> drop(columns: ["host"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
